  2. People are bad at reporting what they eat. That’s a problem for dietary research  Science
  3. Predictive equation derived from 6,497 doubly labelled water measurements enables the detection of erroneous self-reported energy intake  Nature.com
  4. Researchers propose novel model to screen misreporting in dietary surveys  Medical Xpress
  5. Predictive equation helps estimate misreporting of energy intakes in dietary surveys  Nature.com

item.title: Indoor cycling can improve your memory, says study - Stewartville Star
item.description: Indoor cycling can improve your memory, says study  Stewartville Star
